entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon then flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
